Daisy Family Fast-Food Restaurant http://www.dexknows.com/business_profiles/daisy_family_fast_food_restaurant-l808804817/ (610) 863-4044 6589 Sullivan Trl , Wind Gap , PA 18091 40.827435 -75.295146 Send to Phone Write a Review Reviews by Glenn T. - 06/25/2009
A frequent stop when out motorbiking. The burgers are ok-a bit overpriced, but the fries are really good. Their ice cream is smooth and creamy and I generally like stopping here. It is a frequent stop... Read Full Review on Yelp.com.
